name: LRO - Luggage Retrieval Officer
description:
You begin your career as a Trainee, retrieving the boring bags of coach ticket holders when their luggage goes amiss. But before long you will work your way to being a highly ranked member off staff retrieving important missing luggage for the likes of the Natural History Museum, NASA and even the FBI!

Gameplay

Story Mode - Complete 50 puzzles as you rank up and learn what it truly means to be a Luggage Retrieval Officer

Arcade Mode - 500 extra puzzles, challenge yourself to beat your own best move count and get graded against the best possible for each puzzle.

Controls

A - Select / Deselect Luggage

Up/Down/Left/Right - Move Cursor

A game for the Gameboy Advance (playable with emulators on most platforms). Made for Winter GBA Jam 21 using Butano.

Credits
  • Music by Tempest SoundCloud | itch.io
  • Title Screen Art by Vent

Source code available here.

Check out more my games and blog posts at jonoshields.com
